gartic.title: Gartic
gartic.description: Gartic is an online drawing game in which players have to guess what the other players are drawing. With up to 10 participants per room, at the start of every round, a player is chosen to draw a random word, while the other players have to try and guess it. The first player to score more than 120 points wins.

fidgetspinner.title: Fidget Spinner
fidgetspinner.description: Spin to score! This arcade game will see how much you can spin the toy. Twirl the spinner fast to mark new records of RPM and accumule spins to unlock new spinners, with new designs!

breaklock.title: Breaklock
breaklock.description: A hybrid of Mastermind and the Android pattern lock. A game you gonna love to hate. The difficulty setting changes the amount of dots to connect. Easy is 4 dots, medium is 5 dots and hard is 6 dots. Good luck!

memorygame.title: Memory Game
memorygame.description: Train your memory!Just tap on the card to reveal what's behind it. Your aim is to find all the possible pair as soon as possible.

snakisms.title: Snakisms
snakisms.description: Pippin Barr's Snakisms is a version of the classic game Snake, but with a selection of philosophical viewpoints to choose from at the outset.

2048.description: The goal is to get a single square to be 2048. Use your arrow keys to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one!

webflap.title: Web Flap
webflap.description: Fly through the pipes without crashing! This extremely addictive arcade game spawned a worldwide Flappy Bird craze. You must react quickly to glide through each set of pipes. Time each move perfectly to continue flying and set a high score!

paperplanes.title: Paper Planes
paperplanes.description: Throw a paper plane as far as you can. Collect points and upgrade your plane so you can throw it even further.

toppletrump.title: Topple Trump
toppletrump.description: Topple Trump is the US presidential election game you'll love to hate. Can you take down Trump before it's too late?

padpiper.title: PadPiper
padpiper.description: An easier way to find student housing. We know how hard it can be to find housing as a student, so we created PadPiper to make a better process for students and landlords.

redbus.title: Redbus
redbus.description: World's largest online bus ticketing platform offers bus travels, ac volvo bus, hotels and bus hire at best rates. Easy cancellation and Instant refund.

jwshowcase.title: JW Showcase
jwshowcase.description: JW Showcase is an open-source video website builder. It enables anyone to create beautiful, mobile-responsive html5 video site in 15 minutes with no coding and minimal configuration.

nylon.title: NYLON
nylon.description: Fashion, beauty, music and pop culture news for today's young women. Multiplatform media service that focus on art, beauty, music, design, celebrities, technology and travel.

resi.title: Resi
resi.description: Resi delivers you the most important news of the day in a very entertaining way via a messaging interface the same way a good friend would do.

climadiario.title: Clima Diario
climadiario.description: Your daily weather. Know in real time the weather conditions and the forecast of the next hours, your neighborhood or the other side of the world.

naukri.title: Naukri
naukri.description: Connect with 20000+ employers. Apply to Millions of job opportunities across top companies, industries and locations on India's No.1 job site. Apply online.

dscova.title: Dscova
dscova.description: Whether you’re local to the area and looking for a new way to spend your day, or a globetrotter on an exciting adventure, Dscova will help you find unique experiences the guidebooks don’t tell you about!

near.title: Near
near.description: Chat with people near you! People can talk with each other nearby in a web app. We would like to share what we did and how to make it.

barcelona.description: The new app of Points of Interest of the City allows to consult all the information of the outstanding places of the set of districts of Barcelona.

housing.title: Housing
housing.description: Search Property in India's first Map Based Real Estate Portal. Browse New projects, flats, ready to move apartments for rent and sale.

Behind the scenes we’re compiling billions of data points from reviews, blogs, articles, social media, and even imagery to truly understand what properties offer the amenities, sentiments, or location you need.

tudu.title: Tudú
tudu.description: Organize and prioritize your tasks and projects so you can stress less and achieve more. Create your to do lists in a very easy way!

hextris.title: Hextris
hextris.description: Hextris is a challenging and intriguing puzzle game in which you must try and stack a series of different colored blocks in a hexagonal formation.

whichone.title: Whichone
whichone.description: Choose left or right as fast as you can.

sudoku.title: Sudoku
sudoku.description: Sudoku is a logic-based, combinatorial number-placement puzzle. The objective is to fill a 9×9 grid with digits so that each column, each row, and each of the nine 3×3 subgrids that compose the grid contains all of the digits from 1 to 9.

photopieces.description: An easy puzzle where you have to complete the pictures.

tajawal.description: Book cheap flights, airline tickets and hotels online!

kimovil.description: On Kimovil you can compare the price of phone you are looking at over 100 national and international stores.

qrcodescan.description: A super easy QR Reader. Turn on the camera, capture the code and discover what it has.

towergame.title: Tower Game
towergame.description: Stack blocks and build the talles tower, so you need from your ability to achieve it!
